name: council_consult
description: Get multi-persona consultation on a strategic problem or decision from 6+ perspectives including growth, finance, risk, operations, customer advocacy, and culture

arguments.name: user_problem
arguments.desc: The strategic problem, decision, or question to get consultation on

arguments.name: desired_outcome
arguments.desc: What success looks like or what you're trying to achieve (optional)

arguments.name: constraints
arguments.desc: Key constraints or limitations to consider (optional)

arguments.name: depth
arguments.desc: Consultation depth: 'brief' for quick summary, 'standard' for balanced analysis, 'deep' for comprehensive exploration

name: persona_consult
description: Get consultation from a specific persona on a problem

arguments.name: persona_name
arguments.desc: Name of the persona to consult: Growth Strategist, Financial Officer, Devil's Advocate, Ops Architect, Customer Advocate, or Culture Lead

arguments.name: user_problem
arguments.desc: The problem or decision to consult on

name: council_define_personas
description: Define or customize the personas used for consultation. Adjust their perspective, focus areas, and constraints to match your organization's needs

arguments.name: selected_personas
arguments.desc: List of personas to include in the council

arguments.name: overrides
arguments.desc: Custom overrides for specific personas (soul, focus, constraints)

name: council_discuss
description: Interactive multi-turn council session with clarifications, debate cycles, and consolidated final answer

arguments.name: requestText
arguments.desc: The user's request or question to the council

arguments.name: personasRequested
arguments.desc: Specific persona names to include (optional, overrides automatic selection)
